speaker: Editor team
title: Powered by Azure Machine Learning service: Editor makes your writing shine
description:
Editor is an intelligent proofing and editing service that leverages machine learning and natural language processing to make suggestions to help you improve your writing. The Editor team is making Editor even smarter, faster, and more flexible for users. More info... 

Jump to:
[01:58] What is Microsoft Editor?
[02:35] About the ML models 
[03:04] About the corpus data used to train public data sets
[04:28] How Azure Machine Learning enables data scientists to train on hundreds of GPUs simultaneously
[05:57] Demo - PyTorch on Azure Machine Learning 
[07:15] Demo - Microsoft Editor
